learning_objective: Decompose problems and subproblems into parts to facilitate the design, implementation, and review of programs.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has been asked to develop a popular board game into a computer game. Which sub-tasks can Alex divide the game in order to develop? Select two.",
    "Answer1": "Creating a database to store all the names of the players worldwide",
    "Answer2": "Replicating the rules of the board game into programming logic",
    "Answer3": "Making a virtual reality version of the game",
    "Answer4": "Designing the virtual game board and pieces closely resemble the physical game",
    "CorrectAnswer": ["2", "4"],
    "Explanation": "Turning a popular board game into a computer game involves many sub-tasks. Sub-tasks such as replicating the rules of the board game into programming logic and designing the virtual game board and pieces closely resemble the physical game are crucial parts. Creating a database to store all the names of the players worldwide and making a virtual reality version of the game, while certainly possible, are both more in line with extra features, not necessary components of the game."
}
